protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for the lysosphingolipid sphingosine 1- phosphate (S1P). S1P is a bioactive lysophospholipid that elicits diverse physiological effect on most types of cells and tissues. This inducible epithelial cell G-protein-coupled receptor may be involved in the processes that regulate the differentiation of endothelial cells. Seems to be coupled to the G(i) subclass of heteromeric G proteins

go_class.description: lysosphingolipid and lysophosphatidic acid receptor activity
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
